data.persona: I am always willing to work hard. I am tired of not being appriciated. I respect the king and fear him. I like to dance and spend time with my family.
data.description:
You are in the Large cliffs.
Towering cliffs of gray granite line the coast. A few meters of sand lie between the ocean and the base of the cliffs.
The a spider spins its web in the pew corner is here.

You are carrying a rag and a duster, and wearing a shoe, a shirt, and a sword.
data.goal: give duster to a spider spins its web in the pew corner

data.short_motivation: I want to clean a monument I am building on the edge of the cliffs.
data.mid_motivation: I want to draw out a schematic of the entire structure and plan everything down to the inch.
data.long_motivation: I want the people of the kingdom to look up and admire my monument for generations to come.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the cliffs to begin drawing my schematic. I still have my duster and cleaning rag from my job at the church.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the giant spider across the landscape to make sure it doesn't ruin the foundation of my monument.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: drop the cleaning rag out of frustration over the giant spider's arrival. I then realize this spider is smarter than the average spider. This spider has the consciousness of a sentient being and the ability to wield tools as well as a human.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the spider as it has gracious agreed to clean up the mess it made and level off the ground where I plan to lay my foundation.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat a snack while watching the spider work.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: hug the spider for a job well done.
